data.title: Nardin Academy
data.text:
Founded

Founded in 1857, Nardin is the oldest independent, Catholic school in Western New York.

Location

Nardin is one Academy located on two campuses in the Elmwood Village.

Where Current Families Live

Nardin Academy students represent towns and cities from 32 districts all across Western New York and Southern Ontario.

Average Student/Faculty Ratio

10:1

AP Exams Administered in May 2023

14 subjects

College Placement

100% college placement

College Scholarships

Graduating classes earn an average of $30 million in scholarships and grants to top colleges across the country.

Athletics

41 teams in 18 sports

Dining Hall

Our innovative dining hall program offers food that is locally sourced from nearly 30 local farmers and vendors and always scratch cooked.

Mascot

Gator

School Colors

Green & White
